name: Ext_R4B_Encounter_reasonCode
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Encounter.reasonCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Encounter.reasonCode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Encounter|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Coded reason the encounter takes place
element.definition: Reason the encounter takes place, expressed as a code. For admissions, this can be used for a coded admission diagnosis.
element.comment: `Encounter.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Encounter.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Encounter.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Coded reason the encounter takes place
element.definition: Reason the encounter takes place, expressed as a code. For admissions, this can be used for a coded admission diagnosis.
element.comment: `Encounter.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Encounter.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Encounter.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Encounter.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Reason why the encounter takes place.
